title: Revert ezreals ult cooldown nerf
body:
Seriously increasing by 50% was downright insane to ezreal wave clear.
i cant even play ap anymore cause i have no cs and cant defend my tower or push my lane to go follow my enemies roam.
i have to go a hybrid ad/ap build to even be remotly useful so i can push the lane and still deal damage with my AA while also keeping burst to kill squishies. that ult nerf was insane to ap ezreal and did nothing to blue fist ezreal. just revert his nerfs and make frozen fist melee only problem solved.
